document.full_text: the missouri attorney general filed a federal lawsuit on tuesday asking a judge to stop the u.s. army corps of engineers' plans to detonate the levee at birds point on the mississippi river.
document.title: missouri sues to block demolition of river levee
lines_and_colors: the missouri attorney general filed a federal lawsuit on tuesday asking a judge to stop the u.s. army corps of engineers' plans to detonate the levee at birds point on the mississippi river.
